channel.title: How to add a global object on Devolution V7.0?
channel.description:
I was with Delta a while ago. I knew how to add an object in my server but now, I changed for Devo and I don't know how to add an object to my server. It's completly diffenrent.
Any help please ? Thanks.

item.title: How to add a global object on Devolution V7.0?
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“Maximum ZxZ, post:9, topic:300451”][quote author=Epic Ancient link=topic=396724.msg2946619#msg2946619 date=1252252356]

If it’s Delta, it’s something else. I believe.

I’m with Devolution. I want to add an object but I don’t know how. I can’t find makeGlobalObject in client.java. MakeGlobalObject is for Delta, not for Devolution.

Delta and nondelta sources.
Umm. You got teamviewer? I’ve done a bit of coding on dev, a while back…
[/quote]

Could you help me without Teamviewer please ?[/quote]

I’m not entirely the best with help without it. ^^"
Delta confuses me quite a bit, and Dev I barely worked with. Not much information holds true to my memory anymore.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add a global object on Devolution V7.0?

item.title: How to add a global object on Devolution V7.0?
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

[quote=“Abdullah111, post:4, topic:300451”]Open u’r Client.Java.

Search for :

makeGlobalObject

U will see something like this code.

makeGlobalObject(XPOS, YPOS, [Object Code], [Height], 10);

Ok now copy a rule like makeGlobalObject(XPOS, YPOS, [Object Code], [Height], 10);. Copy It.
And paste it below the object code.
Now Change the XPOS and YPOS where u want it u can go there ingame and do ::mypos or ::coords its about u’r commands ingame.
And now change [OBJECT CODE] into some object what u want.

Explain :

makeGlobalObject(3433, 2886, 410, -2, 10);

Don’t forget to compile if u done."

Gl :)[/quote]

Hmm… Can’t find “makeGlobalObject” in client.java.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add a global object on Devolution V7.0?

item.title: How to add a global object on Devolution V7.0?
item.dc:creator: @Abdullah111 Abdullah111
item.description:
@Abdullah111 wrote:

Open u’r Client.Java.

Search for :

makeGlobalObject

U will see something like this code.

makeGlobalObject(XPOS, YPOS, [Object Code], [Height], 10);

Ok now copy a rule like makeGlobalObject(XPOS, YPOS, [Object Code], [Height], 10);. Copy It.
And paste it below the object code.
Now Change the XPOS and YPOS where u want it u can go there ingame and do ::mypos or ::coords its about u’r commands ingame.
And now change [OBJECT CODE] into some object what u want.

Explain :

makeGlobalObject(3433, 2886, 410, -2, 10);

Don’t forget to compile if u done."

Gl

Read full topic
